japanese: 「燃えろ！　ジャスティス学園」のファイルに/　　　ＥＤＩＴキャラのデータがありません。/　　　　　何かボタンを押してください。
english: 'Burn ! Justice Academy' file has,  /no EDIT character data.  /Please press any button.

english: 'Burn ! Justice Academy' file has,  /no 'Burn! Hot-Blooded Youth Diary' data. /Please press any button.

japanese: 「聖女」っていっても、/「聖純女学院」の意味だよ。/勘違いした？
english: 'Saint' just means  /'Seijun Girls' Academy'. /Misunderstood?

japanese: 「試合」なら、奴らに分があるかもな。/だが「戦い」なら絶対に負ける事はねぇ！/それだけは間違いないぜ。
english: In a 'match', they might have an advantage. /But in a 'battle', I'll never lose!  /That's for sure.

japanese: 「３回まわって、ニャア〜ン」って/いったら、考えてもいいわよ？
english: If you say 'spin three times, nyaaan~', /I might consider it.

japanese: 『ただいまより、/　「ミス・ジャスティス」コンテストの/　参加受付を開始いたします』
english: 'We will now begin, /accepting applications for the,  /'Miss Justice' contest.'

japanese: 『なお、飛び入り参加も歓迎しますので、/　多数の参加をお待ちしております』
english: 'Walk-ins are also welcome, /we look forward to many participants.'

japanese: 『アメリカン晴れ』？/そんなのはないんじゃないか？
english: 'American clear'? /That doesn't exist, does it?

english: I'll put you in a feature:  /'Mysterious women alone  /at the campfire !'

english: I'll put you in a special feature,  /'Lonely men who came alone,  /to the campfire !'

english: A...  !0... /It's nothing really...

english: A... That's right.  /He goes to that school now.

english: A-ah…

english: A-ah…  /of course...

english: Ah, no, um… right! /I'm anemic, so,  /I have to avoid blood donation! !

english: Ah, no, um… right! /I'm anemic, so,  /I have to avoid blood donation! !

english: Ah, sorry...  /I got carried away and was too familiar...

english: Ah, sorry...  /I got carried away and was too familiar...

japanese: あ、そうか。/普通のお祭りみたいな気分だったから、/そんな風に思わなかったな。
english: Ah, I see.  /It felt like a regular festival, /so I didn't think that way.

japanese: あ、そうだ……。/クッキーやらケーキやらを/もらってきてたんだ。
english: Ah, that's right…  /I got cookies and cake,  /and stuff.

japanese: あ、そうだ。/私、!0をキャンプファイアーに/誘おうと思って待ってたんだ。
english: Ah, that's right. /I was waiting to invite !0,  /to the campfire.

japanese: あ、そうだったのか？/もしかして、/起こしちゃ悪かったかな？
english: Ah, was that it?  /Maybe I shouldn't have,  /woken you up?

japanese: あ、そうなんですか……。/すいません。
english: Ah, is that so…  /Sorry.

english: Ah, got it! /I'll check again!

english: Ah, but...  /Is it no good...?

english: Ah, I see.  /Makes sense. /My brother worked hard too.

japanese: あ、やっぱり学園祭の日でも/朝練したんだ。
english: Ah, you practiced even  /on festival day.

japanese: あ、ゆりかさん。/いやぁ、楽器がいっぱい置いてあったんで、/キレイだなと思って見てたんです。
english: Ah, Yurika-san. /There were lots of instruments,  /so I was admiring them.

japanese: あ、ゆりかさん。/楽器がいっぱい置いてあったんで、/キレイだなと思って見てたんですよ。
english: Ah, Yurika-san. /There were lots of instruments,  /so I was admiring them.

japanese: あ、イヤ、そういう意味で/いったんじゃないですよ！/思ったより風流だなぁって……。
english: Ah, no, I didn't mean /it that way !  /Just thought it was elegant...

japanese: あ、ロベルトとまりがいる。/何を話してるんだ……？
english: Ah, Roberto and Mari. /What are they talking about...?

english: Ah, Roberto and Mari-chan.  /What are they talking about...?

english: Ah, Shoma.  /What are you doing,  /spacing out?

english: Ah, Shoma.  /What's up?

japanese: あ、将馬。/道の真ん中で何やってるの？
english: Ah, Shoma.  /What are you doing there?

japanese: あ、当たり前だろ？/ボクにとっては、アメリカの方が/過ごしやすいからね。
english: Ah, of course.  /For me, America is,  /easier to live in.

japanese: あ、私、/これから探しに行くから！/じゃね！！
english: Ah, I'm going to look now ! /See ya! !

japanese: あ、英雄先生！/見に来てくれたんですね！
english: Ah, Shimazu-sensei! /You came to see !

japanese: あ、醍醐先輩！/たいやきを買ってきたんですよ。/醍醐先輩も食べますか？
english: Ah, Daigo-senpai! /I got taiyaki. /Want some, Daigo-senpai?

japanese: あ、醍醐先輩！/たいやきを買ってきたんですよ。/醍醐先輩も食べます？
english: Ah, Daigo-senpai! /I got taiyaki. /Want some, Daigo-senpai?

english: Aah... Chairperson. /What's up today?

english: Aah... Kyosuke, /about that report...

english: What? ! /You're bad at it? !  /Is that your excuse?!

english: Ah…  /I couldn't achieve much, /which is a bit disappointing ...
